page.title: 18FUND RAISING
page.content: Every year,in the summer term,we have a Coffee Morning for the School Fund. This year it was on Saturday June 1st. There was a plant stall,cake stall, juice & crisps stall,gift stall and an ice-cream stall.This year we raised more money than ever.In one room there are the stalls and in the other tables are set where they have their coffee or tea and cakes.The money raised goes to the school fund which helps to pay for school trips,Christmas Party,visit to the pantomime,prizes and entrance money for entries to the Annual Perth Festival.Parents and some pupils bake cakes,scones,pancakes and make sweets for the stalls.One of the grandads grows lots of plants from seed in his greenhouse for the plant stall.Pupils and parents knit or make gifts for the gift stall. Everyone in the school is involved and we all have a lovely time
